scripts.build: node tools/build/clean-dist.mjs && npx tsc -p tsconfig.app.json --noEmit && node tools/build/esbuild.mjs && npx tsc -p tsconfig.tests.json && npm run lint:deps && npm run lint:css && node tools/build/copy-static.mjs
scripts.start: npm run build && npx http-server dist -p 8000 -c-1
scripts.test:e2e: PLAYWRIGHT_CSS_COVERAGE=1 npm run build && npx playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.test:e2e:no-coverage: npm run build && npx playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.test:e2e:server: npm run build && PLAYWRIGHT_USE_GO_SERVER=1 PLAYWRIGHT_CSS_COVERAGE=1 npx playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.test:e2e:headed: npm run build && npx playwright test --project=chromium --headed
scripts.test:e2e:firefox: npm run build && npx playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.test:e2e:firefox:headed: npm run build && npx playwright test --project=firefox --headed
